105.description: Pumps his blood faster to dramatically increase his speed.

105.name: Gear Fourth: Boundman
105.description: A powerful transformation combining his rubbery body with Haki.

105.name: Gum-Gum King Kong Gun
105.description: His most powerful punch in Gear Fourth.

106.name: Incinerate
106.description: Fires a powerful beam from his cannon arms.

106.name: Spiral Incineration Cannon
106.description: A more powerful, focused incineration beam.

106.name: Self-Destruct
106.description: A last resort that deals massive damage to everyone.

107.name: Hell Storm
107.description: Creates a psychic blizzard of small objects.

107.name: Psychic Whirlwind
107.description: Traps an opponent in a telekinetic vortex.

107.name: Blizzard Group
107.description: Boosts the ATK and DEF of her entire team.

108.name: Water Stream Rock Smashing Fist
108.description: A flurry of precise, defensive strikes.

108.name: Abandonment
108.description: Increases his ATK and SPD for several turns.

108.name: Cross Fang Dragon Slayer Fist
108.description: A combined attack with his brother, Bomb.

109.name: Atomic Slash
109.description: Slashes an opponent dozens of times in an instant.

109.name: Air Blade
109.description: Sends a sharp slash of air at the opponent.

109.name: Focused Atomic Slash
109.description: A more powerful, focused version of his signature move.

109.name: Atomic Beeline Slash
109.description: A devastatingly fast charge and slash.

110.name: Trick Play
110.description: Uses his backpack of tricks to confuse the enemy.

110.name: Underdogma
110.description: A full-power attack from his giant robot.

110.name: Brave Giant
110.description: Summons his giant mech for a powerful attack.

110.name: Okame-chan
110.description: A device that scans the opponent and reveals their weaknesses.

111.name: Missile Barrage
111.description: Launches a volley of homing missiles.

111.name: Jet Propulsion
111.description: Boosts his SPD for several turns.

111.name: Full Salvo
111.description: Unleashes his entire arsenal at once.

111.name: Battle Robot
111.description: Deploys a powerful combat drone to fight alongside him.

112.name: Infinite Regeneration
112.description: Heals a portion of his HP at the end of every turn.

112.name: Dual Pistols
112.description: A rapid-fire attack with two pistols.

112.name: Axe
112.description: A powerful swing with a fire axe.

112.name: Undying
112.description: A reckless attack that deals damage based on his missing HP.

113.name: Doggy Paddle
113.description: A surprisingly powerful flurry of paw strikes.

113.name: Fierce Howl
113.description: Lowers the opponent's ATK and DEF.

113.name: Guard Dog
113.description: A powerful defensive and offensive stance.

113.name: Unleashed
113.description: Attacks with the full, primal fury of a beast.

114.name: Gold Form
114.description: Transforms into a golden chariot for a powerful charge.

114.name: Tactical Transformation
114.description: Changes form to best suit the situation, boosting a random stat.

115.name: Fighting Spirit
115.description: His ATK rises the more damage he takes.

115.name: Savage Tornado
115.description: Spins his bat to create a destructive whirlwind.

115.name: Indomitable
115.description: Refuses to go down, surviving a fatal blow with 1 HP.
